name: GDevelop 5 P2P Example
description:
I made a GDevelop 5 example that makes multiplayer possible!!!

Just download and open!

Controls: 

Left Arrow Key - Left

Right Arrow Key - Right

Up Arrow Key/Space Key - Jump

Escape Key - Disconnect

If you device has a touchscreen on-screen controls will show.

You MUST use the LATEST version of GDevelop 5

Took about 3 hours and 30 minutes to make this example :'(
